examples: That holiday cost me a small fortune.

words.defineEn: a day or period of time fixed by law when we don't have to go to school or work

examples: The Siemens display goes the whole hog.

To go swimming/fishing/jogging.

words.defineEn: to travel or move from one location to another location
words.defineVi: để đi du lịch hoặc di chuyển từ một địa điểm đến một địa điểm khác

examples: Many investors have turned their attention to opportunities abroad.

words.defineVi: Vào hoặc tới nước ngoài

examples: He told me to go away.
His friends soon go away.

examples: My family and I look forward to the weekend every week.

words.defineVi: các ngày trong tuần, thường là thứ bảy và chủ nhật, khi mọi người không phải đi làm hoặc đi học

examples: Buses take priority over other vehicles on the road.

words.defineVi: một chiếc xe lớn chở nhiều hành khách bằng đường bộ

The kids can't wait to go camping.

words.defineVi: hoạt động ‌sống ngoài trời trong lều, người cắm trại, v.v. trong kỳ nghỉ

examples: A true leader walks the talk.

words.defineEn: a short journey we take on foot
words.defineVi: một hành trình ngắn chúng ta đi bộ

examples: Life goes on.

Shares went on sale this morning.
words.defineEn: to come to be or to happen
words.defineVi: để trở thành hoặc xảy ra

words.defineEn: to leave the house to go somewhere, usually to do something enjoyable
words.defineVi: rời khỏi nhà để đi đâu đó, thường là để làm điều gì đó thú vị

Last night we served individual portions of chicken and mushroom aspic.
words.defineEn: the time when the sun goes down, it gets dark outside, and we sleep
words.defineVi: thời gian khi mặt trời lặn, trời tối bên ngoài, và chúng tôi ngủ

examples: We often take weekend trips to nearby cities for sightseeing and relaxation.

As you can see, even with the most powerful graphics card on the market, we are struggling to break 150 fps on this puppy, so you're definitely buying into the future-proofness when it comes to sightseeing eye-candy single player games like this one.
words.defineEn: the activity of visiting places of interest in a particular location as a tourist

examples: The latest skiing accident is a case in point.

Jane also took up skiing at 57.

words.defineVi: hoạt động hoặc môn thể thao di chuyển trên tuyết trên ván trượt

Cycling is potentially very dangerous in the city - you have to have all your wits about you.
But it still just keeps cycling.
Monthly frequency is called ultra rapid cycling.

words.defineVi: môn thể thao hoặc hoạt động đi xe đạp

examples: Swimming is second nature to Jane.

words.defineVi: hành động di chuyển cơ thể của chúng ta trong nước bằng cách sử dụng cánh tay và chân của chúng ta, đặc biệt là một môn thể thao

examples: After that, unlike the Maine, it was clear sailing for me.

words.defineVi: thực hành cưỡi thuyền như một sở thích

We all have different surfing personalities, and we take our surfboard out, and if there’s a certain political wave coming in, our personality may match the wave of that moment, and we’ll ride to shore into the presidency.

words.defineVi: môn thể thao hoặc hoạt động cưỡi ván lướt sóng để di chuyển trên sóng

examples: My dad took me fishing, and we caught a big fish.
To go swimming/fishing/jogging.

words.defineVi: hoạt động đánh bắt cá bằng các thiết bị đặc biệt như dây câu và lưỡi câu hoặc lưới

examples: This book bridges a gulf between the metaphysics literature and philosophy of mind literature.

words.defineEn: to arrange and confirm a seat, ticket, room, or place on a transportation, accommodation, or event
words.defineVi: để sắp xếp và xác nhận chỗ ngồi, vé, phòng hoặc địa điểm trên phương tiện giao thông, chỗ ở hoặc sự kiện

examples: The vision seems a flight of fancy.

words.defineVi: hành động đi du lịch trên máy bay

examples: The online retailer had an edge over the other services with its faster shipping and wider selection of products.

words.defineVi: kết nối với hoặc thông qua Internet

examples: My dad bought a stylish suit for his friend's wedding.

examples: I took a photo of the mountain peak, capturing its majestic beauty.

examples: The store stays open late on Thursdays.

words.defineVi: sống ở đâu đó trong một thời gian ngắn, đặc biệt là với tư cách là khách hoặc du khách

examples: The hotel had expensive rates during the holiday season.

examples: Friends shared a platter of crispy chicken wings with tangy dipping sauces at the sports bar.

words.defineVi: một khu vực cát hoặc đá nhỏ bên cạnh biển hoặc hồ

words.defineVi: một trải nghiệm thú vị hoặc thú vị hoặc khoảng thời gian

examples: Things like this take time.

words.defineEn: the quantity that is measured in seconds, minutes, hours, etc. using a device like clock
words.defineVi: số lượng được đo bằng giây, phút, giờ, v.v. bằng thiết bị như đồng hồ

examples: The apartment has a secure entry system.

words.defineVi: một nơi có một vài phòng để mọi người ở, thường là một phần của tòa nhà có những nơi khác như vậy trên mỗi tầng

examples: They hired a detective firm to dig up dirt on their rival.

words.defineVi: để trả tiền cho việc sử dụng một cái gì đó như một chiếc xe hơi, nhà, thiết bị, vv tạm thời

examples: The twins have two bicycles.

words.defineVi: một chiếc xe có hai bánh mà chúng ta lái bằng cách dùng chân đẩy bàn đạp của nó

examples: I've never skied before, so here goes nothing.

words.defineVi: một trong hai vật dài mỏng đeo ở chân để giúp chúng ta di chuyển nhanh hơn trên tuyết

examples: Are you feeling comfortable?

The rug in front of the fireplace provides a comfortable spot to sit.
words.defineEn: physically feeling relaxed and not feeling pain, stress, fear, etc.
words.defineVi: thể chất cảm thấy thoải mái và không cảm thấy đau đớn, căng thẳng, sợ hãi, v.v.

examples: The rich businessman owned multiple luxurious cars.

words.defineEn: extremely comfortable, particularly when expensive things are involved
words.defineVi: cực kỳ thoải mái, đặc biệt là khi những thứ đắt tiền có liên quan

examples: She's very friendly and very down to earth.

She approached him with a friendly smile, but she got the cold shoulder, as he turned away without a word.

words.defineVi: tử tế và tốt đẹp đối với người khác

words.defineEn: providing assistance or useful help in making a situation better or easier

examples: We ate dinner in a noisy café.

examples: The purple flowers in the vase were beautiful.

It's beautiful!

The vibrant purple color of whinberries adds a beautiful touch to desserts like cheesecakes and tarts.
words.defineEn: extremely pleasing to the mind or senses
words.defineVi: cực kỳ dễ chịu cho tâm trí hoặc các giác quan

examples: There's a lovely park right on our doorstep.
She was a lovely woman and my mother truly enjoyed her company.
I have been as busy as a beaver these last few weeks crocheting up custom orders for some lovely customers.

words.defineVi: rất đẹp hoặc hấp dẫn

examples: The water feels warm.
Are you warm enough?

The season of summer brings warm weather and longer days.
words.defineEn: having a temperature that is high but not hot, especially in a way that is enjoyable and pleasant
words.defineVi: có nhiệt độ cao nhưng không nóng, đặc biệt là theo cách thú vị và dễ chịu

examples: The flowers bloomed under the sunny sky.

The sunny weather melted the snow, revealing patches of green grass.

The sunny day encouraged us to go for a bike ride.
words.defineEn: very bright because there is a lot of light coming from the sun
words.defineVi: rất sáng vì có rất nhiều ánh sáng từ mặt trời

examples: The design is very basic.

words.defineVi: có hoặc cung cấp các yếu tố hoặc mức độ đơn giản nhất

examples: She found a dirty stain on her favorite shirt.

words.defineEn: having stains, bacteria, marks, or dirt
words.defineVi: có vết bẩn, vi khuẩn, vết hoặc bụi bẩn

examples: As Jessica watched her son's new girlfriend interact with their family, she couldn't help but feel a bit uncomfortable, considering that the girl appeared to be old enough to be his mother.

That chair looks super uncomfortable.

words.defineVi: mô tả một cái gì đó mà làm cho một người cảm thấy xấu hổ hoặc lo lắng

examples: The other dogs were unfriendly, too.

words.defineEn: not kind or nice toward other people
words.defineVi: không tử tế hoặc tốt đẹp đối với người khác

words.defineVi: không cung cấp bất kỳ hỗ trợ hoặc giúp đỡ hữu ích trong việc làm cho một tình huống tốt hơn hoặc dễ dàng hơn

examples: The elevator doors opened, revealing a crowded lobby.

Kelly giggled as she caught Josh making sheep's eyes at her across the crowded room.

words.defineVi: (của một không gian) chứa đầy đồ vật hoặc con người

examples: The cruise went very quickly.

examples: It's windy!

it's not windy?

words.defineEn: with a lot of winds or exposed to winds
words.defineVi: với rất nhiều gió hoặc tiếp xúc với gió

examples: I didn't have the foggiest idea what he was talking about.
I don't have the foggiest idea how to fix a car.
The glass gets foggy.
So the evolution of pterosaurs is still foggy.
They then put the spheres in a foggy wind tunnel.
words.defineEn: filled with or full of fog
words.defineVi: đầy hoặc đầy sương mù

examples: The cloudy sky created a dramatic backdrop for the sunset.
The weather forecast predicted a cloudy morning followed by clearing in the afternoon.
I carried an umbrella with me because the weather looked cloudy.
We decided to postpone our outdoor plans due to the cloudy weather.
I couldn't see any stars because it was too cloudy at night.
words.defineEn: having many clouds up in the sky
words.defineVi: có nhiều đám mây trên bầu trời

examples: Your presentation sounded great, honestly.
The finance minister's fall from grace gave his enemies great satisfaction.
To show great courage.
The pope himself had taken great umbrage at the book.
The baby has brought them great joy.
words.defineEn: worthy of being approved or admired
words.defineVi: xứng đáng được chấp thuận hoặc ngưỡng mộ

examples: The old lady's cake wasn't wonderful
Doesn’t Rosie look wonderful?
Squash adds a wonderful texture and sweetness to curries.
Since the news broke I've received thousands of wonderful letters.
To my eye, Jake, you're the most wonderful man on the planet.
words.defineEn: very great and pleasant
words.defineVi: rất tuyệt vời và dễ chịu

examples: Danish Blue cheese is fantastic in vegetarian dishes.
The vibrant hue of damson makes it a fantastic ingredient for homemade fruit popsicles.
Take time by the forelock and accept that fantastic internship!
She told me that yeast extract is a fantastic seasoning substitute for reducing sodium in my meals.
All my friends agree that Gruyère is a fantastic melting cheese.
words.defineEn: extremely amazing and great
words.defineVi: cực kỳ tuyệt vời và tuyệt vời

examples: OK, mum's the word!
OK, it’s a deal.
Ok, we can have pasta for dinner tonight.
OK, I'll do it -
OK, what happened at Blair's party last night?
words.defineEn: said to show that we are agreeing to do something or we agree with something
words.defineVi: nói để thể hiện rằng chúng tôi đang đồng ý làm điều gì đó hoặc chúng tôi đồng ý với điều gì đó

words.defineEn: rather good or pleasant
words.defineVi: khá tốt hoặc dễ chịu

examples: Wow, all his geese are swans, all right!
Everything will be all right.
It's all right for some, huh?
All right, let's kick it into high gear for the last part of today's workout!
It’s all right for Washington, but will it sell in small-town America?
words.defineEn: to an extent or in a manner that is acceptable
words.defineVi: đến một mức độ hoặc trong một cách đó là chấp nhận được

examples: She said an awful lot
The incident says an awful lot about his character.
It's awful having a boss who breathes down your neck all the time.
I told you that you'd feel awful if you drank that much wine.
He couldn't help but grimace when he saw the awful outfit his friend was wearing.
words.defineEn: extremely unpleasant, bad, or disagreeable
words.defineVi: cực kỳ khó chịu, xấu, hoặc khó chịu

examples: She said an awful lot
The incident says an awful lot about his character.
It's awful having a boss who breathes down your neck all the time.
I told you that you'd feel awful if you drank that much wine.
He couldn't help but grimace when he saw the awful outfit his friend was wearing.
words.defineEn: extremely unpleasant, bad, or disagreeable
words.defineVi: cực kỳ khó chịu, xấu, hoặc khó chịu

examples: The team took a terrible beating.
You've made a terrible mess of this job.
I had terrible butterflies before I gave that talk in Venice.
The situation was terrible, but like many politicians he was attracted by troubled waters.
The entire region has been in the grip of a terrible drought.
words.defineEn: very bad, disagreeable, or unpleasant
words.defineVi: rất xấu, khó chịu, hoặc khó chịu
